Great game if you like shooters, however there is a downside, there is cheaters and there is many of them. Its hard to start out as a newbie so i would recommend becoming better in other game modes then competitive when you are starting out. Also like this you will raise your trust factor and grind your way to prime (lvl 21) if you can not spend money on the game.

Try make some friends and que together. Wish you guys luck and have fun!
